TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecific extends System.Web.UI.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供一个构造，用于在 [<DeviceSpecific>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) 元素中的多个备选内容间指定选择。

span.span: Provides a construct for specifying a choice among multiple content alternatives in the [<DeviceSpecific>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[\<有 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)元素中，通常指定一个或多个[\<选项 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素，其中每个元素都包含指定如何针对目标设备功能评估选项的属性。Within a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, you typically specify one or more [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements, each containing attributes that specify how to evaluate the choice against target device capabilities. 在运行时，将按顺序对每个选项进行计算，并使用成功计算的第一个选择。At run time, each choice is evaluated in order, and the first choice that is successfully evaluated is used. 使用了用来指定模板集和替代属性的选项;例如，它可用于指定 控件的特定于设备的图像。The DeviceSpecific/Choice construct is used to specify template sets and override properties; for example, it can be used to specify device-specific images for the control. > [!NOTE] > 即使 类从 Web 窗体 `System.Web.UI.Control` 命名空间继承，这只是一个实现细节。Even though the class inherits from the Web Forms `System.Web.UI.Control` namespace, this is only an implementation detail. `` 元素的行为与控件不同。A `` element does not behave like a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 对象创建特定于移动窗体中各种设备的接口。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects to create interfaces specific to a variety of devices in a mobile form. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 以上所有代码都可以用以下标记以声明方式替换：All of the code above can be replaced declaratively with the following markup: 对于这些示例，web.config 文件必须具有以下元素：For these examples, the Web.config file must have the following elements:

summary.span: 在 [<DeviceSpecific>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) 元素中检索选项的集合。

span.span: Retrieves the collection of choices in a [<DeviceSpecific>](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The collection of choices in a element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，集合中的选项将按照它们的存储顺序进行计算。At run time, the choices in the collection are evaluated in the order that they are stored. 有关特定于选择和特定于设备的概念的详细信息，请参阅[\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素。For more information about choice and device-specific concepts, see the [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来显示 ASP.NET 移动 Web 应用程序中定义的第一个筛选器中包含的模板数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display the number of templates contained in the first filter defined in the ASP.NET mobile Web application. 有关更完整的代码示例，请参阅 概述的示例。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过使用指令的 特性来禁用该页的视图状态管理，也可以通过设置各个控件的 属性来禁用视图状态。You can disable view-state management for the page by using the attribute of the directive, or you can disable view state on individual controls by setting their individual properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件未模板化，则返回 `null`; 如果所选模板集中不存在模板，则返回。Returns `null` if the control is not templated, or if the template does not exist in the selected template set.

summary.span: 获取当前选定的选择，如果没有适用的选择，则为 。

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用特定于设备的构造来指定控件或样式的特定于设备的内容，如属性重写或模板。You can use a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct to specify device-specific content, such as property overrides or templates, for a control or style. 若要从[>\<](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)设备上的选项中选择一个选项，ASP.NET 将按顺序对目标设备的功能评估每个选择。To select a choice from the choices in a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, ASP.NET evaluates each choice in sequential order against the capabilities of the target device. 第一个匹配选项是所选选择，并用于特定于设备的内容。The first matching choice is made the selected choice, and is used for device-specific content. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性显示与当前选项关联的筛选器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the filter associated with the current choice. 有关更完整的代码示例，请参阅 概述的示例。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileDeviceChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[MobileDeviceChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
